keyMoments.title: Krieg Pirates Retreat from Baratie
keyMoments.description: Following Don Krieg's defeat, Gin orders the Krieg Pirates to retreat from the Baratie, effectively ending their invasion.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the Krieg Pirates' attempt to take over the Baratie and their defeat in the East Blue.

keyMoments.title: Receives Supply Ship from Sanji
keyMoments.description: The defeated Krieg Pirates receive the Baratie's supply ship from Sanji to aid their retreat.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the compassion shown to defeated enemies and ensures the crew's survival.

description: Formerly the largest pirate fleet in the East Blue with 50 ships and 5,000 men, now reduced to a single damaged ship after their encounter with Mihawk and subsequent defeat at the Baratie.
